---
format: dashboard
params:
  Id: 'GEL'

---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
endereco <-
  'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Nw9Xj8TcuwFxeTml8oE_fPH0-SXWjRQzOCJsP_t1sms/edit#gid=0'

dados <-
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(endereco,
                            sheet = '2InsT')


dados <- dados |> 
  dplyr::filter(Id == params$Id)

```
